s0431: Fu Chen advised: 'Ping, Huan, Zhuang, Hui all received service from Zheng, if the king abandons his relatives and favors Di, it cannot be followed.'
s0433: Sixteenth year, the king deposed the Di queen, the Di people came to attack, killed Tan Bo.
s0434: Fu Chen said: 'I have advised many times and you did not follow.
s0435: If I do not leave now, will the king consider me resentful?'
